channel.title: CVE Feed for StreamWeasels -- StreamWeasels Twitch Integration
channel.description: The latest CVEs for StreamWeasels -- StreamWeasels Twitch Integration

item.title: CVE-2022-4974|2024-10-16T06:43:30.014Z -- streamweasels -- streamweasels%20twitch%20integration
item.description: The Freemius SDK, as used by hundreds of WordPress plugin and theme developers, was vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery and Information disclosure due to missing capability checks and nonce protection on the _get_debug_log, _get_db_option, and the _set_db_option functions in versions up to, and including 2.4.2. Any WordPress plugin or theme running a version of Freemius less than 2.4.3 is vulnerable.

item.title: CVE-2024-32716|2024-06-04T17:52:03.446Z -- streamweasels -- streamweasels%20twitch%20integration
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in StreamWeasels StreamWeasels Twitch Integration.This issue affects StreamWeasels Twitch Integration: from n/a through 1.7.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-32716|2024-08-02T02:20:35.206Z -- streamweasels -- streamweasels%20twitch%20integration
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in StreamWeasels StreamWeasels Twitch Integration.This issue affects StreamWeasels Twitch Integration: from n/a through 1.7.8.
